resources.string:
The port is blazing with the amount of work\! 

 Control left and right by tapping on the edges of the screen. To reset the box - click on the bottom of the screen. After dropping a box, the turn passes to your opponent. Line up 4 boxes of your color in a row and prevent your opponent from doing this, and victory will be in your pocket\! 

 But don't forget the extraneous crates! They reset every 4 turns and can interfere with your strategy!But don't forget the extraneous crates\! They reset every 4 turns and can interfere with your strategy\!
